title: Project Management
description: Project Management

title: Project Management
description: Project Management

title: Send welcome kit
description: Send welcome kit to the customer to gather required information.

title: Project kick off
description: Schedule and conduct the project kick off meeting.

title: Get Azure subscription access
description: Request Azure subscription access for the resources assigned to the project. This will need to be at least read-only during during the discovery phase. When the delivery phase starts, contributer access will be needed to start the work.

title: Request ASR Deployment planner setup
description: Work with the customer to get ASR deployment planner setup in their environment and gathering data for at least a week. This will assist with migration planning.

title: Change request for ASR deployment
description: Change request for the deployment of the ASR components.

title: Schedule meetings/standups
description: Schedule customer meetings or standups.

title: Develop engagement schedule
description: Develop engagement schedule

title: Get VPN access to datacenter
description: Request VPN access to the customer's datacenter environment if necessary for discovery and deployment.

title: Get jumpbox and access
description: Request a jumpbox to be provisioned in the customer's datacenter for 10M resources.

title: Get server local admin credentials
description: Request service account with local administrator credentials on that servers that will be migrated. This will be used by the ASR services to install the mobility agent on the servers.

title: Get vCenter RO service account
description: Request vCenter RO service account. This will be used by the ASR services to connect to vCenter and discover resources.

title: Complete VDC questionairre
description: Complete VDC questionairre.

title: Network mapping review
description: Network mapping review.

title: Get updated migration inventory
description: Request updated migration inventory. This could be based on the 10vu assessment documentation, but should be reviewed for accuracy. The workloads should be placed into buckets that match the SoW and migration plan.

title: Setup SharePoint pages
description: Setup internal and exteranl SharePoint pages for the customer.

title: Setup Teams channels
description: Setup internal and external MS Teams channels

title: Setup Timecodes and Harvest forecast
description: Setup timecodes and forcast items for the project.

title: Create budget sheet
description: Create budget sheet

title: Update and validate timeline
description: Update and validate the project timeline.
